response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $15,000, making it an attractive proposition for you. Should you decide to proceed, I assure you of a seamless transaction and excellent after-sales support. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
